response.overview: Brainy Baby is university studied and published in JOCAM Journal of Children and Media. Winner of 77 awards Brainy Baby Laugh and Learn interactive infant early learning DVD helps infant brain development exposing infants, babies and toddlers to matching games, music, things that go and much more. This DVD and all Brainy Baby DVDs feature live action and real children while using familiar objects to help make fast learning connections. Children love Brainy Baby and parents tell us their children love to watch them again and again, learning something new each time.
response.tagline: Brainy Baby Laugh & Learn: Learning and Discovery Infant Brain Development
response.title: Brainy Baby: Laugh and Learn
